name: E-commerce Dashboard

name: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task organization tool with team assignment features, deadline tracking, and progress visualization

description: WebSocket-based messaging application with group conversations, file sharing, and typing indicators

description: Business intelligence platform for data visualization, KPI tracking, and custom report generation

name: Customer Portal
description: Self-service platform for customers to manage accounts, track orders, and access support resources

description: Reservation platform with calendar integration, automated confirmations, and payment processing

name: Social Media Dashboard
description: Multi-platform social media management tool with post scheduling, analytics, and engagement tracking

name: Expense Tracker
description: Personal finance application for budget management, expense categorization, and spending insights

name: Weather Forecast App
description: Location-based weather service with hourly forecasts, severe weather alerts, and interactive radar maps

name: Fitness Tracking Platform
description: Workout logging and progress tracking application with exercise library, goal setting, and nutrition monitoring

name: Recipe Management App

name: Project Timeline Tool
description: Gantt chart-based project planning application with milestone tracking and resource allocation features

name: Video Streaming Platform
description: On-demand video service with adaptive streaming, playlist creation, and recommendation engine

name: Job Board Application
description: Employment marketplace connecting job seekers with employers, featuring application tracking and resume management

name: Learning Management System
